creator: e_sopo@yahoo.es
text:
there is a conflict between apache 2 and mcafee viruscan pro v7 on win32 (i 
tested it in win2k and winxp).

when those 2 applications are installed apache start to consume a lot of cpu 
resources and don't process any requested web page.

the only solution i've found is removing mcafee viruscan.

btw, i had no problems with apache and viruscan in version 6 and lower.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 8325 ***
creator: slive@apache.org
